name: Dead Mail
description:
Note for Firefox users: due to an unknown RenpyWeb bug, the web build of our game may or may not work in Firefox. Please use Chrome, or one of the downloadable builds below. We Promise they work fine.

Dead mail refers to mail that is undeliverable as addressed or undeliverable at a forwarding address and cannot be returned to the sender.

This is a game about some mail that the USPS, as well any other sane postal agency, would definitely classify as dead.

We hope you have as much fun playing this little thing as we had making it.

Writing and programming by shantaram https://shantaram.itch.io

Art by KuangYuCheng https://deviantart.com/kuangyu-cheng

Music and interactivity https://souncloud.com/kylanhaffie

Made for Talkative Server World Wide Game Jam, September 2019,

with the theme: "Afterlife"

Android builds: [If you are not sure what 64-bit is, select universal]

  • 64-bit
  • universal

These builds are not signed, so you may see a Play Protect warning, but it is safe to ignore it, I promise :P
